subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: how to transcribe air and ear
msgSnippet: I think one of the benefits of QuickScript is its imprecision.
messageBody:
I think one of the benefits of QuickScript is its imprecision.

On Thu 2007.11.01, at 09:23, paulhtremblay wrote:
Why wouldn't we want to use IPA? it is very precise. There are other
pronounciation keys, such as the ones used in American dictionaries,
but they wouldn't allow us to have the precise conversation we are now
having.

I think one of the benefits of QuickScript is its imprecision.

On Thu 2007.11.01, at 09:23, paulhtremblay wrote:
> Why wouldn't we want to use IPA? it is very precise. There are other
> pronounciation keys, such as the ones used in American dictionaries,
> but they wouldn't allow us to have the precise conversation we are now
> having.


--Apple-Mail-5-879415617
